title: Any update on server Transfer?
body: title says it. Its taking so long ;/

replies.body: I know it kinda sucks not knowing the current state of the transfer service, but the latest update from HollyMonster still mentions needing about 5-6 weeks which was about a month ago.
I know im praying they actually stick to their word this time instead of making us wait an extra month or two again just to let us down
It's not so much "sticking to their word" as it is "trying to figure out what broke and why" xD. If they could, those transfers would already be working!
Then they shouldnt have given a time frame whee people were expecting it then make them wait way longer.
I'm on vacation in Australia, would have been fun to play a few games against real people in this region and not just bots.
Yep im just trying to get a transfer and theyve been delaying it for so long..
